item.title: SoK: Let the Privacy Games Begin! A Unified Treatment of Data Inference Privacy in Machine Learning
item.description: Our paper on the use of cryptographic-style games to model inference privacy is published in IEEE Symposium on Security and Privacy (Oakland):
